name: Elemental Magic
description: Reduces Skill Casting time and increases Ranged Heroic Damage Defenses if a Chakram is equipped. This is a passive skill.

name: Cloud of Frost
description: Powerful Magic Heroic Attack in a line.

name: Fiery Crab
description: Powerful Magic Heroic Attack within range.

name: Blessing Elemental
description: Temporarily increases the level of the Summoned Monster and its basic Stats.

name: Elemental Tentacle
description: Temporarily causes Hold with a certain chance after a powerful Magic Heroic Attack in a line.

name: Elemental Rejuvenation
description: Reduces the duration of debuffs used by the caster and Summoned Monster, and increases Heroic Damage and Movement Speed if a Chakram is equipped. This is a passive skill.

name: Spectral Storm
description: Temporarily causes Chaos with a certain chance after a powerful Magic Heroic Attack within range.

name: Absolute Territory
description: Temporarily reduces the caster's Skill Casting time. Curses a target that attacks the caster with an Elemental Curse to deal Heroic Damage Over Time.

name: Iron Protector
description: [Party] Removes Frenzy and Disease effects on your party members within range.

name: Prismatic Chain
description: Temporarily causes Disease with a certain chance after a powerful Magic Heroic Attack in a line.
